name: Parasitosis
description:
Being a teenager can be tough, especially when you randomly develop itchy welts on your skin that you just can't ignore - in the middle of the night, when you're all alone. Monsters come in many forms...

Developed in Unreal Engine 4 for the Scream Jam 2021. This is a short atmospheric game that we really enjoyed creating and we hope you will enjoy playing :)

Team:

-Programmer: Bella Blackwood (FNGD)

-Artist: Sam Blackwood (FNGD)

All assets are original content made during the 10 day jam, except for fonts and sound, which are as follows:

-Sound effects: mixed from various sounds uploaded to freesound.com by InspectorJ, Kmoon, adielees9, Mattruthsound, studentanita, mlsulli, renatofarabeuf, Duckduckpony, dav0r, Nightflame, 45t and dimbark1

-Music: Dusty Memories by Darren Curtis | https://www.darrencurtismusic.com/
